A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wasn't sure how I felt about The Last Jedi when I saw it th first time\, however\, after seeing it a second time I absolutely loved it. There is so much going on it was hard to process at first and the second time I saw it I was able to appreciate the the complexity and all of the emotions the film stoked. If you felt like I did when you saw it\, go see it again. It's a totally different experience.
